text: Logo Loodus was an Estonian publishing company which was located in Tartu, Estonia. It was the largest publishing company existed in Estonia in 20th century. Company was established by Aleksander Audova, Hans Männik, Johannes Piiper, August Reeben, Jaan Rumma and Johannes Voldemar Veski. In the end of 1930s, company's stocks were shared over 300 owners. Published series: "Nobeli laureaadid", "Kirjasõna suurmeistrid", "Looduse kuldraamat". During its existence, the company published over 2000 books. ==References== Category:Publishing companies of Estonia
title: Loodus
